description:
Azalyn decides to go back to her childhood home on planet Ashran. The planet itself hasn’t changed much, but its inhabitants have. Ever since the Ashran royal family executed by Azalyn’s father, the people have harbored a grudge against the Raalgon Empire. Azalyn doesn’t remember the details of the event very well, only that she was good friends with Ruu.
Source: crunchyroll
